title: How to activate breakout rooms in Zoom - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some step-by-step instructions for activating Zoom’s breakout rooms: Log into your Zoom account on their website.Go to your account by clicking “My Account” in the top-right corner.Under the “Personal” heading in the left sidebar, click “Settings.”Under the Meetings tab, scroll down to the “In Meeting (Advanced)” category.Click the switch to enable breakout rooms.Also enable pre-schedule breakout rooms by selecting the checkbox below the switch toggle.Now load the Zoom app on your Mac or PC and you will see the “Breakout Rooms” icon on the bottom right of your screen.If you’re not sure how to facilitate interaction in the rooms, here’s a helpful guide to using breakout rooms in Zoom.
You need to go through the settings to enable breakout rooms first. See my tutorial for details
